content: The place is ready. Time to give <style=NpcName>Medowlyn</style> a call and invite her to move in!

content: I also enjoy sunshine and walks... I could walk all day! As for the rest, baa... {短暂停}now that I'm living here, you'll find out in time~.

content: Now, let's welcome <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, the owner of this Planet, to say a few words!

content: Whoa, what a lively place. {A笑眯眯}Baa-mm, I'm <style=NpcName>Medowlyn</style>, a plushie designer. I like handicrafts and everything floofalicious.

content: {A期待}Yeee! It's you, Medowlyn! I really, really love the plushies you make. Well mah... welcome to your new home here!

content: I hope we get along well.

content: Baa-maa, baa-maa~, so that cloud floating by was a sign of good news! Are you calling to tell me... that everything's ready for the move-in?

content: Hoho~, thank you all for your warm welcomes. Wishing our new friend a smooth and joyful life here. Now then, today's welcome party has come to a wonderful end!
